bio:
Name: HORLA (Azippy)
Professional Accomplishments
- Onboarding Newcomers: I have successfully onboarded numerous newcomers to the crypto sphere.
contributionDescription: As an Optimism ecosystem user, I go beyond personal benefits. I promote growth by onboarding users, giving feedback, and creating awareness. This strengthens the network effect and attracts developers. I also educate and advocate for Layer 2 solutions, making them accessible. Using these solutions, like DeFi and NFTs, supports the ecosystem's economic health.

contributionLinks.description: I share educational event with my community members on my WhatsApp/twitter
